title: Old Standard Watch Face
summary: Beautifully corroded Clock Widget and Android Wear smartwatch.
description: There you found it in some dusty box in a dark corner of the attic: A really old Standard watch face showing signs of wear and tear.The tiny seconds hand is counting down to the death of your battery.Perfect face for your steampunk pocket watch running Android Wear.Optimized for minimal battery usage.Note: Please make sure your watch runs Android Wear 1.4 or newer. Watch Face image taken from this great blog post:http://www.epbot.com/2012/12/printable-pocket-watch-faces.html
descriptionHTML:
There you found it in some dusty box in a dark corner of the attic:
A really old Standard watch face showing signs of wear and tear.
The tiny seconds hand is counting down to the death of your battery.
Perfect face for your steampunk pocket watch running Android Wear.

Optimized for minimal battery usage.

Note: Please make sure your watch runs Android Wear 1.4 or newer.

Watch Face image taken from this great blog post:
http://www.epbot.com/2012/12/printable-pocket-watch-faces.html
comments: I've had many watch face making apps and watch faces, but this face gets me the most compliments and the best look for no cost. I love this watch face.
This watchface is why I bought a smart watch.  Charming.
Use to work on my lg watch but now it does not have tried everything. Works on lg phone. But will not download to lg ware.

Thanks to a quick response from the developer, was finally able to get it working. I love the look of the face, but not sure about the simple sleep face, I mean, REALLY minimalistic. Maybe it'll grow on me. Otherwise great developer customer support!
Absolutely gorgeous watch face.  I love really complex, high-tech faces, but have an equal love for the traditional. This one makes you feel like you have an old, rare watch on your wrist.
